data.comment: The match has started, with Watford kicking-off.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Bristol City with the kick-off.
The away team have replaced Andre Gray with Troy Deeney. This is the first substitution made today by Vladan Ivic.
Dean Holden (Bristol City) is making a first substitution, with Chris Martin replacing Famara Diedhiou.
In the minute 82, William Troost-Ekong is replacing Jeremy Ngakia for Watford at Ashton Gate.
Dean Holden is making the team's second substitution at Ashton Gate with Nahki Wells replacing Antoine Semenyo.
Stipe Perica is replacing Joao Pedro for the away team.
Dean Whitestone blows to end the match. The final score is 0-0.
